mapper.select: SELECT tpdm.productNo , tpdm.productTypeCd , tpdm.productNm , tpdm.brandNo , tpdm.minProductCount , tpdm.maxProductCount , tpdm.price , tpdm.salePrice , tpdm.totalPrice , tpdm.viewType , tpdm.regUser , tpdm.regDt , tpdm.updUser , tpdm.updDt , tbdm.brandNm , tcdm.codeNm , tlkm.likeNo FROM tbProductMaster tpdm LEFT JOIN tbBrandMaster tbdm ON tpdm.brandNo = tbdm.brandNo LEFT JOIN tbCodeMaster tcdm ON tpdm.productTypeCd = tcdm.code LEFT JOIN tbLikeMaster tlkm ON tlkm.targetNo = tpdm.productNo AND tlkm.likeTypeCd = '003002' AND tlkm.regUser = #{loginMemNo} WHERE tpdm.viewType = '01'
